channel.title: After the ninja's..
channel.description:
Wonderfull game absolutely loving it, but my game starts to lag very heavily when I am reaching the point where that guard was killed by a ninja. When I walk out the door it lags really really badly while I haven't had any lag issue at all before that besides when entering a loaded file or new file I need to look around a few times and then the lag dissapear but that is no problem for me.
tl;dr Game lags (5fps) after meeting these ninja's (Invisible with glowingly red eyes NPC's)

item.title: After the ninja's..
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Specs? Maybe your video card doesn’t like the idea of rendering invisible ninja girls

Read full topic
